name: Mad Machines: Grease
detailed_description:
This is the unique “Support the Devs” package available only before and during Season ZERO.

As a big THANK YOU for your support, here’s the special Monkey Wrench Weapon!

GREASE DLC includes:
- The “Monkey Wrench” Weapon universally available for each class.

This offer ends June 20th, 2019.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Mínimo:
  • Requiere un procesador y un sistema operativo de 64 bits
  • SO: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Procesador: Intel Core i3-4170 @ 3GHz or AMD FX 8300 @3GHz
  • Memoria: 4 GB de RAM
  • Gráficos: Nvidia GForce GTX 750 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • DirectX: Versión 11
  • Red: Conexión de banda ancha a Internet
  • Almacenamiento: 8 GB de espacio disponible
  • Tarjeta de sonido: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Notas adicionales: Note: This title supports 64-bit Windows ONLY
